works.description:
Treasured Hungarian Family Recipes 1,2,  
and 3 are English language Hungarian heritage recipe cookbooks by my  
Mother, Helen M Radics.  The owner of the above blog Clara Margaret
Czegeny  
has been committing copyright infringement all over the internet and in  
printed form for the past year.  Her eBay listings have been removed by  
Waterloo Regional Police many times for stealing my Mother's cookbook  
covers, illegally altering the cover and putting it up for sale on eBay by
  
stating that she is Helen M Radics author of Treasured Hungarian Family  
Recipes.  Here on your site she is manipulating our copyrighted cookbook  
Treasured Hungarian Family Recipes and also comitting identity theft once 

again, by stating that the co-author of her cookbook is Helen who authored
 
Treasured Hungarian Family Recipes.  That is false, fraudulant and  
unathorized usage of my Mother Helen's name in association with her  
website.  My Mother Helen is the only author of Treasured Hungarian Family
 
Recipes.  Our coocbook also contains a section of Gerbeaud Slice and  
Gerbeud Cafe (Zserbo)which she has entirely stollen and somewhat reworded,
 
and passed it off as her own work.  She has also included Treasured  
Hungarian Family Recipes as a label, and also as a meta tag on her Blog  
site.  Her profile also states that she has authored my Mother's cookbook 

Treasured Hungarian Family Recipes.  I wish to ask you to please help us  
protect our rights by removing the copyroight infringing and identity
theft  
blog completely.  Thank you for your time and assisstance.  Sincerely,   
Helen Radics Jr. Manager of Treasured Hungarian Family Recipes
